thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great family place
thread.title_full: Great family place - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kevinbu1
title: Great family place
text: This Residence Inn is great. Rooms are large and clean for NYC and it is literally close to everything. Just around the corner is the empire state building and just a few minutes walk to times square. Breakfast is included and they have a very nice selection of hot and cold food. Kids loved it. Staff was very accommodating too. Will definitely come back here. Great place if you only have a few days to see the city. Very reasonable, especially for a family.
